Life

16 Mar 2018

Life is such a hilarious, ridiculous, frustrating, tumultuous experience. Whether or not I am actually enjoying said experience is still TBD.

Today I got offered a job interview from a company that has already offered me a job once, and a former flame who I thought had a boyfriend sent me some snaps that, well, suggested she no longer has a boyfriend. GG I suppose.
